answerText: carbon capture and sequestration [or word forms; prompt on "(carbon) capture"][10] One way of achieving carbon sequestration is by seeding the ocean with this metal, which promotes the growth of carbon dioxide-consuming phytoplankton.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Illinois A-Rutgers A-Alabama A | 9 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this class of processes by means of which carbon dioxide is removed from the atmosphere and stored in some sort of reservoir.
